Design for the Embroidery of a Man's Waistcoat, Probably no. 951, of the "Fabrique de St. Ruf"

label: Description
value: Left bottom corner; slightly rising bottom edge. A fox seated by a basket and a harvesting fox are shown upon baskets, which are supported by S-shapes from which festoons are suspended around leaf scrolls, from which bunches of flowers rise. A basket stands upon a similar bracket, on the pocket. Top edge: bottom parts of figures.
